task_templates.name: Check Water Lines (morning)
task_templates.description: Go to the back of the each cage line, and check if the floating red ball at the end of the water line is at the middle of the transparent pipe.

task_templates.name: Check Water Lines (noon)
task_templates.description: Go to the back of the each cage line, and check if the floating red ball at the end of the water line is at the middle of the transparent pipe.

task_templates.name: Clean Dung Conveyors
task_templates.description: Use soft scraper to clean the end of the conveyors, after dung removal

task_templates.name: Dung Conveyors Aligment
task_templates.description: Inspect dung conveyors during dung removal operation

task_templates.name: Feed Silo Level
task_templates.description: Check Feed Silo Level to order new Feed

task_templates.name: Flush Water Lines
task_templates.description: Using the Flush water system to clean the water line.

task_templates.name: Check Feeding Trough Magnet
task_templates.description: Make sure the Feeding Trough Magnet is in the correct location. Front and Back.
